Title: Establishes an energy-related public utility mass real property central assessment program
Summary: Establishes an energy-related public utility mass real property central assessment program.
LawCode: Amd §200-a, add Art 4 Title 6 §§499-tttt - 499-eeeee, RPT L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to an energy-related public utility mass real property central assessment program
